errors.notFound: Ten kanał nie został znaleziony. Upewnij się że wpisujesz nazwę pomiędzy `<>` . Na przykład: `twitch notif add #kanał użytkownik_twitcha`.
errors.noPrivateMessage: Ta komenda nie może zostać użyta w prywatnej wiadomości.
errors.checkFailure: Nie masz uprawnień do używania tej komendy.
errors.commandOnCooldown: Możesz użyć tej komendy ponownie za {amount} sekund.
errors.badArgument: Wpisano błędne wyrażenie. Wpisz `twitch help {command}` ,aby zobaczyć użycie.
errors.reportGenericError: Proszę, zgłoś ten problem do twórców na stronie https://l.disgd.pw/support.
errors.userRegexMismatch: To nie wygląda na poprawną nazwę użytkownika Twitcha. Możesz używać tylko podkreśleń, liter i numerów.

perspective.deletedToxicMessage: {author}, Twoja wiadomość została skasowana ponieważ uruchomiła filtry toksyczności. ({score}/{max})

streamerNotifs.invalidSubcommand: Wyświetl sekcję **`Streamer Notifications`** używając komendy pomoc, aby zobaczyć użycie.
streamerNotifs.notifCount: Na tym kanale {} powiadomienia streamera są skonfigurowane
streamerNotifs.embedContentTooLongFallback: Niestandardowe wiadomości nie zostały uwzględnione w komunikacie, ponieważ w sekcji znajduje się limit zawierający 1024 znaki. Będą one nadal wyświetlane, gdy użytkownik uruchomi streama.
streamerNotifs.noNotifsSetUp: Dla tego kanału nie są skonfigurowane powiadomienia o streamerach.
streamerNotifs.footerAppendedContent: • Dołącz do serwera wsparcia na discord.me/konomi, jeśli komunikat nie wyświetla się poprawnie
streamerNotifs.userNotSetUpForChannel: Ten użytkownik nie istnieje lub nie jest skonfigurowany dla tego kanału.
streamerNotifs.notifRemovedSuccess: Nie otrzymasz więcej żadnych powiadomień na kanale {channel} kiedy `{user}` odpali streama.
streamerNotifs.notifAddedSuccess: Powinieneś teraz otrzymać powiadomienie na kanale {channel} kiedy `{user}` odpali streama.

help.helpIntroMsg: Witaj! <:twitch:404633403603025921> Jestem botem, który pomaga połączyć serwery Discorda z Twitchem.

fields.name: Commands
fields.value:
Aby wyświetlić pełną listę komend wpisz `twitch commands`.

**upewnij się że zostawiasz `<>` i `[]` ,kiedy używasz komend, znaki te są na stronie pomocy.**

fields.name: Support
fields.value: Znaleziono błąd lub są problemy z botem? Dołącz do Discorda [here](https://discordapp.com/invite/UNYzJqV) i drużyna wsparcia Ci pomoże.

fields.name: Website
fields.value: Możesz zobaczyć moją stronę na https://twitch.disgd.pw.

fields.name: FAQ
fields.value: Niektóre, najczęściej zadawane pytania i odpowiedzi są zebrane [here](https://twitch.disgd.pw/how-to.html).

fields.name: Upvote
fields.value: [Zagłosuj na mnie na DBL](https://discordbots.org/bot/twitch/vote), aby uzyskać dostęp do audio.

fields.name: Donate
fields.value: Chcesz abym dalej działał na Discordzie i dostać za to parę nagród? Odwiedź mój Patreon na https://patreon.com/devakira.

fields.name: About
fields.value: Aby wyświetlić statystyki i więcej, wpisz `twitch info`. Zostałem stworzony przez Akira # 4587 z discord.py rewrite.

fields.name: Partners
fields.value: Szukamy streamerów Twitcha, którzy używają TwitchBota. Złóż podanie i zdobądź wyjątkowe nagrody: https://twitch.disgd.pw/partners

fields.name: :flag_us: :flag_gb: :flag_es: :flag_br: :flag_fr: :flag_jp:
fields.value:
Want to help translate TwitchBot to your language? We're hiring volunteer translators to make TwitchBot available in multiple languages!

**Apply here if you're interested: https://twitch.disgd.pw/translators**

commands.commandsIntroMsg: **Do not put `<>` or `[]` around command arguments.**

fields.name: General
fields.value:
`twitch help` - Shows bot help
`twitch info` - Shows bot info
`twitch invite` - Displays a link to add TwitchBot to your server
`twitch status` - Shows bot status
`twitch ping` - Pong!

fields.name: Twitch
fields.value:
`twitch user <user>` - Gets info on a Twitch channel
`twitch stream user <user>` - Gets info on a user's stream
`twitch stream watch <user>` - Watch a Twitch stream from Discord
`twitch stream game <name>` - Watch someone stream the specified game
`twitch stream top` - Fetches info on a top stream
`twitch game <name>` - Gets info on a Twitch game
`twitch top` - Gets the most popular Twitch games

fields.name: Clips
fields.value:
`twitch clips from <user>` - Gets a clip from the specified Twitch user
`twitch clips trending` - Gets a trending clip
`twitch clips game <game>` - Gets a clip from the specified game

fields.name: Streamer Notifications & Live Users
fields.value:
`twitch notif add <#discord_channel> <twitch_username> [message]` - Adds a streamer notification for a streamer to the specified channel
`twitch notif remove <#discord_channel> <twitch_username> [message]` - Remove a streamer notification for a streamer to the specified channel
`twitch notif list [#discord_channel]` - Lists the streamer notifications for the specified channel
`twitch live_check <role_name>` - Adds the specified role to users when they go live on Twitch, and then removes the role when they stop streaming

fields.name: Audio
fields.value:
`twitch listen <user>` - Listen to a Twitch stream in the current voice channel
`twitch nowplaying` - Shows the stream currently playing, if any
`twitch leave` - Leaves a voice channel

fields.name: Moderation
fields.value:
`twitch ban <@user> [reason]` - Bans a user
`twitch kick <@user> [reason]` - Kicks a user
`twitch purge <amt>` - Deletes <amt> messages from the channel
`twitch filter set <sensitivity>` - Sets the server-wide toxicity filter
`twitch filter remove` - Removes the server-wide toxicity filter

fields.name: Game Stats
fields.value:
`twitch overwatch <pc/psn/xbl> <player>` - Shows Overwatch player stats
`twitch fortnite <pc/psn/xbl> <player>` - Shows Fortnite player stats
`twitch rl <pc/psn/xbl> <player>` - Shows Rocket League player stats

audio.authorNotInVoiceChannel: You need to be in a voice channel!
audio.notUpvoted:
<:twitch:404633403603025921> You need to upvote TwitchBot to listen to streams! Upvote here -> <https://discordbots.org/bot/375805687529209857/vote>. If you just upvoted, please allow up to 5 minutes for the upvote to process.
**Want to skip upvoting?** You can become a patron at <https://patreon.com/devakira> to listen without upvoting.
audio.userNotOnline: <:twitch:404633403603025921> This user doesn't exist or is not currently streaming. If you entered the channel's url, try again with just the name.
audio.downloadError: <:twitch:404633403603025921> This user doesn't exist or is not currently streaming.

clips.invalidSubcommand: Type `twitch help clips` to view command usage.
clips.noClipsFoundForGame: Couldn't find any clips for that game.
clips.noClipsFoundForUser: Couldn't find any clips for that user.

**<https://discordapp.com/api/oauth2/authorize?client_id=375805687529209857&permissions=8&scope=bot>**
general.infoMsg2:
You can also join the support server here:
**<https://discord.me/konomi>**

liveCheck.noManageServer: You need the **Manage Server** permission to do this.
liveCheck.noLiveCheckSetUp: No live check has been set up for this server. To add live checking, type `twitch live_check role`.
liveCheck.liveCheckRemoved: Successfully removed live checking from this server.
liveCheck.currentLiveCheck: Live checking is currently set up to give the `{role}` role to streamers who go live. If you want to delete live checking, type `twitch live_check --delete`.
liveCheck.noRoleFound: Could not find a role with the name `{}`. Make sure to only enter the role's name, and not the @mention.
liveCheck.liveCheckSetUpSuccess: Users in this server who go live on Twitch will receive the `{}` role.
liveCheck.userNotLiveAuditLog: User no longer live on Twitch
liveCheck.noBotManageRoles: I need the **`Manage Roles`** permission to do this. If I have the permission, then make sure to drag the role named `TwitchBot` above the role you want to live check with.

moderation.banFailed: That member couldn't be banned. Do they have a higher role than me?
moderation.kickFailed: That member couldn't be kicked. Do they have a higher role than me?
moderation.invalidMsgAmt: You can't delete more than 99 or less than 2 messages.
moderation.invalidFilterSubcommand: Type `twitch help filter` to view command usage.
moderation.filterDonateMsg: You need to donate to use this command! <https://paypal.me/akireee>
moderation.invalidSensitivity: Sensitivity can't be above 85 or below 60.
moderation.filterUpdateSuccess: Successfully set this server's toxicity filter to **{amount}%**
moderation.noFilter: No toxicity filter was applied in this server.
moderation.removedFilterSuccess: Successfully removed this server's toxicity filter.

gameStats.InvalidPlatform: Platform must be one of `pc`, `psn`, or `xbl`.
gameStats.overwatchInvalidBattletag: Please enter your battletag in a format of `name#id`.
gameStats.overwatchNoResultsFound: No stats could be found for this player. If your profile is private, you can't see stats for it unless you make it public. Please follow the steps at <https://dotesports.com/overwatch/news/ow-public-private-profile-25347> to make your profile public.
gameStats.fortniteInvalidAccountName: Player not found. Check the spelling of the username or try a different platform.
gameStats.rlInvalidAccountName: Player not found. Please enter the username or Steam profile link of the player, and choose the correct platform.

streams.invalidSubcommand: Type `twitch commands` to view command usage.
streams.twitchUserDoesNotExist: That user doesn't exist or is not online. Make sure you're only entering the user's name and not anything extra, like `()` or `<>`.

Playing {2} for {0} viewers

Stream Preview:

users.twitchUserNotFound: That user doesn't exist. If you entered the user's full profile url, try redoing the command with just their user name.
